member.summary: Defines basic client behavior for browsing folders, downloading messages and other

member.summary: Get or set the folder tree loading mode

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.MessageFetchMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode how messages should be downloaded when fetched automatically

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.RequestedHeaders
member.summary: A list of message headers that will be requested. Set it to null to request all headers

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.AutoPopulateFolderMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the client should automatically populate Folder.Messages or it is done manually by calling Folder.Messages.Download

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.ExamineFolders
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the folders should be examined when requested first

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.FolderDelimeter
member.summary: A char used as delimeter for folders

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.FolderDelimeterString
member.summary: In some cases, the server returns two characters for delimiter, which is weird @"\\"

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.SpecialUseMetadataPath
member.summary: The path where the special use metadata information for folders is stored

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.AutoGenerateMissingBody
member.summary: In case a message has only plain text or only html body available, the other view will be generated automatically if this property is set to true,

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.SearchAllNotSupported
member.summary: Some servers (e.g) imap.qq.com seem not give any response on SEARCH ALL, set this property to true to automatically replace this call by SEARCH SINCE 0000-00-00 in order to fix the issue

member.name: P:ImapX.ClientBehavior.NoopIssueTimeout
member.summary: Number of seconds after which a NOOP command is sent to the server if there is no activity

member.name: M:ImapX.Collections.MessageCollection.Download(System.String,ImapX.Enums.MessageFetchMode,System.Int32)

member.name: T:ImapX.EncodingHelpers.Base64
member.summary: Transforms text to and from base64 encoding using streams.

remarks.para: The built in System.Convert.ToBase64String and FromBase64String methods are prone to error with OutOfMemoryException when used with larger strings or byte arrays.
This class remedies the problem by using classes from the System.Security.Cryptography namespace to do the byte conversion with streams and buffered output.

member.name: M:ImapX.EncodingHelpers.Base64.ToBase64(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts a byte array to a base64 string one block at a time.
member.param: The data.

member.name: M:ImapX.EncodingHelpers.Base64.FromBase64(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a base64 string to a byte array.
member.param: The s.
